data.eml:eml: New species and records of Uropodina mites from Iran (Acari, Mesostigmata)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kazemi, Shahrooz, Abolghasemi, Somayeh (2016): New species and records of Uropodina mites from Iran (Acari, Mesostigmata). ZooKeys 600: 25-34, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.600.8467, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.600.8467
